text: Ngosuku lapho abazenzisi besilisa nabazenzisi besifazane beyothi kulabo abakholwayo “silindeni ukuze sithole okokukhanya kwenu” kuyothiwa “phindelani emumva ngemumva kwenu bese nifuna ukukhanya” manjalo kuyobekwa udonga phakathi kwabo olunesango ngaphakathi, ngaphakathi kunomusa kepha ngaphandle kwalo kunesijeziso
